name: Dice Up! (itch)
description:
Made for the GMTK2022!

Find your way to the top of the jenga tower!

Controls:  

WASD -  Move

Q/E - Rotate camera

We are happy with our idea but we  had to little time to properly polish and design more levels. Post Jam updates to be awaited!

Small note:  The second elevator needs the value 4 to be activated! It is missing guidance at that point.

Thanks for playing!
